Package edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.minesweeper

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Grid
    The Grid class is the foundation for minesweeper, applies mine locations, checks if something is open, makes flags functional, etc.
    GridTest
    Test class for Grid
    GUIGame
    Makes the game on the terminal functional
    GUITest
    Test class for GUI components
    HelpScreen
    HelpScreen.java is a Panel that displays help messages and a button to return to the StartMenu
    MineComponent
    An Swing component for playing MineSweeper
    MineGUI
    MineGUI.java is a base that calls all GUI objects and handles tasks such as pausing the game, creating the GUI, making the escape key functional, and allowing for a new game.
    TextGame
    Makes the game on the terminal functional
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MineException
    An exception for illegal moves in MineSweeper, used in GUIGrid (its an unchecked exception, so it extends RuntimeException rather than Exception)
